teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: Bhaskar Chanda
teams.loan_because:
Bhaskar Chanda currently lives in Toronto, where he is a Project Manager and Associate Scientist at the University Health Network’s McEwen Centre for Regenerative Medicine. Born and raised in Kolkata, India, Chanda studied engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology (now called the Institute of Technology and Marine Engineering, or ITME). He obtained his Masters in Medical Science from the University of Alberta, and recently completed his PhD in Medical Biophysics from the University of Toronto.

In his current position, Bhaskar leads a group of scientists attempting to produce stem cell derivatives for commercial and therapeutic purposes. His colleagues know him as a results-oriented leader with an excellent ability to multitask, analyze, and problem-solve, and a unique capacity for fostering creativity and cooperation.

Chanda had the opportunity to use and hone these skills during his schooling in many leadership roles, including student government, social committees, resident management, and mentorship programs. Despite his demanding academic and extracurricular schedule, he also found time to volunteer for numerous organizations, including Ride for Sight, CIBC Run for Cure, Let’s Talk Science, Gandhi Memorial Leprosy Foundation, Festival of India, Hare Krishna Mandir, and Newton Place Resident Association.

Bhaskar Chanda has won numerous awards and scholarships, including the CIHR Banting and Best Canada Graduate Scholarship, the Ontario Graduate Scholarship, the Text Book Technology Grant, the Alcon Research Travel Award, the Mary Louise Imrie Graduate Student Award, and Award of Excellence (four years in a row). Currently, he is a member of Keystone Symposia Hematopoiesis, the International Society for Stem Cell Research, the Genetic Society of Canada, Engineers Without Borders, and the Indian Society of Human Genetics. He previously trained with the Alberta Vision Science Symposia and The Association for Research in Vision and Opthalmology, and held an executive position with the Edmonton Bangla Utsab Association. His work has been published in Cell and Human Molecular Genetics.

During his scant free time, Bhaskar Chanda entertains a great deal of hobbies and interests, including cooking, traveling, photography, film, music, cricket, and zip lining.

teams.loan_because: We believe in entrepreneurial spirit and want to make our contribution to make the world a better place.
teams.description:
Iceland is a European island country in the North Atlantic Ocean. Our country is volcanically and geologically active, our most famous volcano being Eyjafjallajökull, which erupted in 2010 and made the headlines worldwide. 

Iceland has a total population of only about 320,000 but even though we are few we are proud of being independent and we are always willing to help those that are in need.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Atticus Finch - To Kill A Mockingbird
teams.loan_because:
"Mockingbirds don't do one thing but make music for us to enjoy. They don't eat up people's gardens, don't nest in corncribs, they don't do one thing but sing their hearts out for us. That's why it's a sin to kill a mockingbird."
 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  To Kill A Mockingbird is a 1962  American drama  film adaptation of Harper Lee's novel of the same name. It stars Mary Badham in the role of Scout and Gregory Peck in the role of Atticus Finch.

In 1995, the film was listed in the National Film Registry. It also ranks twenty-fifth on the American Film Institute's 10th anniversary list of the greatest American movies of all time, and #1 on AFI's list of best courtroom films. In 2003, AFI named Atticus Finch the greatest movie hero of the 20th century.
- - - - - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/To_Kill_a_Mockingbird_(film)
 - - - - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/To_Kill_a_Mockingbird
teams.description:
"But there is one way in this country in which all men are created equal - there is one human institution that makes a pauper the equal of a Rockefeller, the stupid man the equal of an Einstein, and the ignorant man the equal of any college president. That institution, gentlemen, is a court. It can be the Supreme Court of the United States or the humblest J.P. court in the land, or this honorable court which you serve. Our courts have their faults, as does any human institution, but in this country our courts are the great levelers, and in our courts all men are created equal."
 - - - - *** Atticus is To Kill a Mockingbird's most upright character, representing the moral ideal of both a lawyer and a human being: he is brutally honest, highly moral, a tireless crusader for good causes (even hopeless ones), a virtual pacifist and, for the most part, devoid of any of the racial or class prejudices afflicting the other citizens of Maycomb. He goes to great pains to instruct his children on the importance of being open-minded, judicious, generous neighbors and citizens. He is eventually revealed to be an expert marksman, but he had chosen to keep this fact hidden from his children so that they would not in any way think of him as a man of violence. He was once the best shot in Maycomb County, but quit shooting because he felt he had an unfair advantage.
 - -  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atticus_Finch

teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.

Australians all let us rejoice

teams.name: Клуб Вулкан Club-Vulkan.com
teams.loan_because:
Клуб Вулкан - комфортный отдых и максимальными игровыми возможностями

Приятной находкой для геймеров станет сайт игрового клуба Вулкан. Данный ресурс расскажет о широких возможностях клуба, предоставив всю необходимую для пользователя информацию. Весь материал изложен в лаконичной, простой и доступной к пониманию форме. Открыв сайт, понимаешь, насколько здесь все грамотно продумано и сделано с любовь к участникам игрового процесса. Первая страница сайта даст исчерпывающие ответы на наиболее распространенные вопросы, касающиеся основных правил, начисления бонусов, ассортимента игровых автоматов вулкан, предоставит услуги по регистрации и порадует новостями.
teams.description:
Войдя на сайт, ясно понимаешь - дело имеешь с респектабельным и солидным заведением. Достойная графика, выдержанные тона, удобный функционал, доступно изложенная информация, краткое описание основных разделов – все говорит о серьезном подходе и заботе о пользователе. Максимально удобное расположение страниц и небольшая аннотация к слотам – все имеет свое место и доступно в любой момент.

Фантастический ассортимент слотов

Раздел порадует наиболее привередливых игроков и удовлетворит самый изысканный вкус. Портал предоставляет оптимальную подборку наиболее популярных и востребованных аппаратов, начиная от классических, и заканчивая самыми современными со спецэффектами. Здесь есть всеми любимые Sizzling Hot, Sharky, Lucky Haunter, Garage, Fruit Cocktail, Rezident, Lucky Lady's Charm, Dolphin's Pearl, Crazy Monkey и многие другие. Игры представлены для новичков в демо-версии, позволяющей поближе познакомиться с их особенностями и правилами. Загрузка игр занимает меньше минуты, а все слоты обладают необходимыми для интересной игры функциями.

Особое внимание вулкан казино уделяет программе технической поддержки и высокому уровню личной конфиденциальности. Служба поддержки работает круглосуточно, оказывая максимальную помощь в кротчайшие сроки, причем удобным для себя способом: телефон, чат, электронная почта. Приятно удивят посетителей портала варианты пополнения и выведения денежных средств, посредством множества платежных систем. 

Игровой клуб Вулкан – комфортный и достойный отдых с максимально широким выбором слотов!

teams.name: UNE-AMP
teams.loan_because: We support the cause and the need of the unconventional and renewable sources of power for the enhancement and upcoming of power needs and standards of people and the world.
teams.description: Our team has the main focus of utilizing the unconventional and renewable sources of power for the advancement and uplifting of electrical power for the common mass.

teams.name: Art on Earth
teams.loan_because: We want our Little piece of Art to make a Difference on Earth
teams.description: Family and friends helping the world in name of our newborn son Art

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.name: DoSomething
teams.loan_because: DoSomething.org is the country’s largest not-for-profit for young people and social change. We have 1,666,208 members (and counting) who kick ass on causes they care about. Bullying. Animal cruelty. Homelessness. Cancer. The list goes on. DoSomething.org spearheads national campaigns so 13- to 25-year-olds can make an impact - without ever needing money, an adult, or a car. Over 2.4 million people took action through DoSomething.org in 2012. Why? Because apathy sucks.

teams.name: The Dunn Kids
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference
teams.description: A family that cares

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***

http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***

http://starfish.dynalias.org/

http://www.kivalens.org/

teams.loan_because: We believe that entrepreneurship can help women lead independent, fulfilling, and meaningful lives that not only benefit them, but their communities as well.
teams.description: Team WYO Skincare! Our project is based around the idea of simple, sustainable, entrepreneurship and we want to do all that we possibly can to help women around the world with their ventures. KIVA is how we're doing it.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.loan_because:

teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Marie Forleo's Kiva Lending Team
teams.whereabouts: Global Baby!  HQ in NYC & LA
teams.loan_because: We're uber passionate about making a difference.  Nothing makes us more excited than using our skills and resources to increase prosperity, aliveness and well-being on the planet.
teams.description: We're a global group of creators committed to doing our best work, giving back and having a GREAT time while we do it!  Wanna join us? Requirements:  a can-do-attitude, sense of humor, a passion for possibility, and burning desire to use your creativity to be of service!
